section.title: Documentation on the Norwegian analyser Oslo-Bergen-taggeren
section.p: The Oslo-Bergen tagger is available for Bokm√•l and Nynorsk. It has an official webpage, where it is available under GPL, this documentation is for the Giellatekno in-house use of it.
